title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Democrats tied in knots over Biden. Mueller, Flynn news. Courageous reopening. Dem governors staying shut down to hurt Trump. Thomas L. Friedman accuses Rush and Trump of destroying "cognitive immunity". Reporters whine about 4 more years of Trump. Seminar questioner at Trump Fox News town hall. Palm Beach boat parade for Trump. Trump's not losing his base. Biden names Chris Dodd of Ted Kennedy waitress sandwich-fame to VP vetting committee. NYT tells DNC to investigate, get rid of Biden.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Plugs can’t be the Democrat nominee and the Democrats know it. Who will replace him? Plugs says 600K have died from coronavirus, MSNBC host corrects him. Montage of hypocrite Dems, including Biden, saying all women should be believed. Cuomo says the lockdown isn’t sustainable. Scarf Queen admits they underestimated the number of asymptomatic carries of the virus. Trump has been sounding the alarm on China for decades. Illinois governor Pritzker’s family flees to Florida, Pritzker says it’s none of anyone’s business. Do professional sports players want to come back? All the female VP candidates are hypocrites on #MeToo. How the Flynn story impacts Biden.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

DNC rejects NYT plea to investigate Plugs. The ChiComs and the virus. What George W. Bush told Rush about the Chinese. ChiComs view us as an enemy. Globalism's aim was to eliminate the United States as a superpower. Chinese did whatever they needed to do to make the virus spread. How the Feds set up Flynn. Democrat governors love the lockdowns. Don Shula. America awash in over-mothered men.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
